name: No Animals Were Harmed
description:
No Animals Were Harmed is a game where you, an evil vampire,  must defeat waves of animals trying to destroy your castle by placing a variety of traps and obstacles. How many waves can you fend off?

**Note there are some fatal crashes that occurred the day of the hand in, I hope you can enjoy despite them.

Features
  • 3 map sizes, each with 4 difficulties
  • Sandbox mode
  • Variety of traps and obstacles
  • Variety of enemy animals
  • Save/Load game
  • High score board
  • Change controls
  • Change graphics settings
  • Change Audio settings
Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • 1-7 - Select Trap/Obstacle
  • Left Click - Place Trap/Obstacle
  • Right Click - Unselect Trap/Obstacle
  • Z - Upgrade Trap
  • X - Delete Trap
  • R - Rotate Trap
  • E - Interact with Portcullis
  • Q - Show Trap Submenu
  • Enter - Skip Preround / End Current Round
  • Tab - Show Animal Route
  • Esc - Pause/Un-Pause Game
